short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to have information about an address in one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need to know the surrounding of an address? Just select the address in a web page then right click and choose "Get information about this address"
